transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello, very good afternoon, Rafiq sir, speaking from IndiaMART. How are you?
Customer: Bas, badhiya, batao.
Executive: Abhi Neha se aapka discussion hua tha na subah?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Haan, ye sara product aap logo ne update bhi kar liya IndiaMART ka portal mein aapka site pe. Ek baar aap check kijiyega sir.
Customer: Hmm, kar leta hu chalo.
Executive: Ek baar aap check kar lena, thik hai? Abhi aapka, uh, ye video meeting bhi ho gaya, thik hai? Aapne abhi brass fire extinguisher valve, brass fire, kayi sara product de rakha hai. Ye sara product hum isme discuss aata hai. Ek minute line pe rehna.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Thik hai, ye sara kuch hum add kara, kuch product add karaya, baki remaining product hai, ye hum add bhi kar denge, thik hai?
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: To sir, main ek baat bataati hu, jo hamara kaam hai aapka catalog mein product add karana hai, correction mapping karana hai, catalog ka store management karna hai, ye sara cheez hai. Aapne catalog ka score hum logo ne 84 pe le gaye. Sir, thik hai, product hai, jo bhi kuch bhi hai, correction karana hamara hath mein hai.
Executive: Kyunki sir, sara kamgori 100% depends from market. Is sab baat ka visibility ke hisab se hai ye. Hmm. Main ye nahi bata rahi hu hamara hath se aise kuch hai, main aapka kaam nahi karu. Aapka catalog ka kaam humne kiya tha, product hai. Abhi aaj aapne char panch product de diya, wo bhi hum logo ne add karaya.
Executive: Aur phir jo bhi ho communication aapka, maine whatsapp number de rakha hai, mobile number de rakha hai, kabhi bhi aap kisi bhi din aapka kuch bhi required aaya, jaise aapne mujhe kal ka din phone kiya tha, maine aapko phone answer karke aapko kiya hai na?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Thik hai, ab continue aage bhi aapko just service diya jayegi. Hamara hath mein jitna possibility hum aapko presentation karayenge, thik hai sir?
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Abhi abhi ek feedback receive hua tha, main with your permission, shall I close this concern, sir?
Executive: Aapne video meeting ke liye ek request a raha tha, video meeting aapka ho gaya. To maine ye video meeting ka done ka behalf mein main ye ticket close kar du?
Customer: Haan, kar do.
Executive: To feedback aa jayega to feedback aap yes de dena sir please.
Customer: Nahi, main koi inquiry aayega na tab main reply karunga.
Executive: Sir, inquiry generate karane ke liye to kaam kar rahe hai na. Hamara jo. Sir, pehle to aap 100% guarantee dete the jab maine wo package kiya tha to ki wo hamara kaam hai aapko business dene ka. Business nahi milega to kaise kaam banega? Paanch mahina to ho gaya char panch mahina.
Executive: Aapko jitna bhi aap related wala keyword mujhe share kara dijiye. Abhi aapne mujhe che saat diya hai, sara ka sara hum logo ne upload kar diya. Aur bhi kuch product aapko update karwana hai, karwa dijiye, thik hai?
Customer: Haan, thik hai, thik hai chalo.
Executive: Thik hai, sara hum log upload karenge, main ek minute wo bhi dekh leti hu. Thik hai, isme ye brass fire ka related ka jo bhi related keyword hai, aap mujhe share kara dena, hum log upload kara denge, thik hai?
Customer: Haan haan haan haan.
Executive: Dekho, video meeting done karaya to uska
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants business from IndiaMART.

- Customer will reply after receiving inquiry.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed products were updated on portal.

- Executive assured continued service and support.

- Executive offered to upload more related keywords.

- Executive asked to close the video meeting ticket.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- catalog, product update, video meeting, keywords
